mapper.insert: insert into fees_receive_storage(fees_no, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, customer_id, customer_name, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, order_type, order_no, product_type, cost_type, subject_code,other_subject_code, tempreture_type, product_no, product_name, external_product_no, quantity, unit, weight, volume, varieties, box, unit_price, continued_price, cost,biz_type,is_calculated, calculate_time, param1, param2, param3, param4, param6, rule_no, bill_no, `status`, operate_time,biz_id,del_flag,first_num, first_price, continue_num, continue_price) values ( #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherSubjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempretureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{externalProductNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{varieties,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{box,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{continuedPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{firstPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{continueNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{continuePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )
mapper.select: select id, fees_no, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, customer_id, customer_name, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, order_type, order_no, product_type, cost_type, subject_code, other_subject_code, tempreture_type, product_no, product_name, external_product_no, quantity, unit, weight, volume, varieties, unit_price, continued_price, cost,biz_type, param1, param2, param3, param4, param6, rule_no, bill_no, status, operate_time, biz_id,del_flag from fees_receive_storage where fees_no = #{feesNo}
mapper.update:
update fees_receive_storage
tempreture_type=#{tempretureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity=#{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, box=#{box,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, unit=#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight=#{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, volume=#{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, varieties=#{varieties,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_price=#{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, continued_price=#{continuedPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cost=#{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_calculated=#{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, calculate_time=#{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, param1=#{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param2=#{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param3=#{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param4=#{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param6=#{param6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_no=#{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_attr = #{contractAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, calcu_msg=#{calcuMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where fees_no=#{feesNo} and subject_code = #{subjectCode} and del_flag='0'
mapper.delete: delete from fees_receive_storage where biz_id=#{bizId} and subject_code = #{subjectCode}
mapper.select: select id from fees_receive_storage where biz_id=#{bizId} and subject_code = #{subjectCode} limit 1

select customer_id as customerId, other_subject_code as otherSubjectCode, SUM(IFNULL(cost, 0) - IFNULL(derate_amount, 0)) as cost from fees_receive_storage where create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY customer_id, other_subject_code
mapper.delete: delete from fees_receive_storage where fees_no in ( select d.fees_no from ( select a.fees_no from biz_outstock_packmaterial a INNER JOIN ( select waybill_no from biz_outstock_packmaterial where customer_id=#{customerId} and del_flag='0' and source in ('import','system') and create_time>=#{beginTime} and create_time< #{endTime} GROUP BY waybill_no having FIND_IN_SET('import',GROUP_CONCAT(source))>0 and FIND_IN_SET('system',GROUP_CONCAT(source))>0 ) b on a.waybill_no=b.waybill_no where a.source='import' and a.del_flag='0' ) d )
